title: finally!
body: I finally finished <a href="http://dottextwiki.scottwater.com/default.aspx/Dottext.InstallationWalkThrough">installing</a> this <a href="http://www.gotdotnet.com/community/workspaces/viewuploads.aspx?id=e99fccb3-1a8c-42b5-90ee-348f6b77c407">.NET blog stuff</a> (thanks for the link <a href="http://redwolves2.myftp.org/blog/default.aspx">Ralph</a>).<br> AIM subprofile imported, yay! (all content before 2004.03.09) So if the older stuff looks weird or breaks, then that is most likely why.  Aside from retrofitting this new system to my subprofile, I'm also going to categorize all the old posts... eventually.
